title: Annie Award for Outstanding Achievement for Writing in an Animated Television/Broadcast Production
text: The Annie Award for Writing in a Television/Broadcasting Production is an <a href="Annie%20Awards">Annie Award</a> given annually to the best writing in animated television or broadcasting productions. From 1995 to 1996, both films and television productions were included in the Best Individual Achievement for Writing in the Field of Animation award. A separate category for writing in animated television/broadcasting productions was created at the <a href="26th%20Annie%20Awards">26th Annie Awards</a>.
